Text.Name: LsHelpPlayHappy
Text.Desc: Playing with spirit pet has made you feel good all day.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that when one's this cheerful, it really brightens one's day

Text.Name: BiteHappy
Text.Desc: A gentle bite from the spirit pet made you feel endorsed.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that It doesn't hurt at all, just a bit itchy

Text.Name: BiteSad
Text.Desc: Slapped hard by the spirit pet and it still hurts. It doesn't seem to like me very much.

Text.Name: PetHeal
Text.Desc: With the spirit pet as company, your mood has become much better.

Text.Name: PetStay
Text.Desc: With the spirit pet as company, your mood has become much better.
